tool.name: PermutationClusteringSeurat
tool.command:
##Rscript example ##Rscript main.R annotated_lorenz_testSCumi_mm10 4 2 10 3 4 csv , 0 griph 0 10 1111 ####Rscript /home/main.R ",matrixName," ",nPerm," ",permAtTime," ",percent," ",format," ",separator," ",logTen," ",pcaDimensions," ",seed," ",sparse
ln -s $matrix /scratch/annotated_matrix.${Format} &&
Rscript /home/main.R annotated_matrix $NPerm $PermAtTime $Percent $Format $Separator $LogTen $pcaDimensions $Seed $sparse &&
mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && tar -zcvf zipOutput.tar.gz -C /scratch/ . && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && tree $html_file.extra_files_path -H . -T "permutationClustering" -o $html_file

param.name: NPerm
param.help: number of permutations to perform the pValue to evaluate clustering

param.name: PermAtTime
param.help: number of permutations that can be computes in parallel

param.name: Percent
param.help: percentage of randomly selected cells removed in each permutation

param.name: Separator
param.help: separator used in count file, e.g. '\\t', ','

param.name: LogTen
param.help: 1 if the count matrix is already in log10, 0 otherwise

param.name: Seed
param.help: important value to reproduce the same results with same input
